Versions

An appendix of hosted documentation for nearly every release of Bootstrap, from v1 through v5.

v5.x

Current major release. Last update was v5.1.3.

5.1 Latest 5.0

v4.x

Our previous major release with its minor releases. Last update was v4.6.0.

4.6 4.5 4.4 4.3 4.2 4.1 4.0

v3.x

Every minor and patch release from v3 is listed below. Last update was v3.4.1.

3.4 3.3

v2.x

Every minor and patch release from v2 is listed below.

2.3.2 2.3.1 2.3.0 2.2.2 2.2.1 2.2.0 2.1.1 2.1.0 2.0.4 2.0.3 2.0.2 2.0.1 2.0.0

v1.x

Every minor and patch release from v1 is listed below.

1.4.0 1.3.0 1.2.0 1.1.1 1.1.0 1.0.0
